2054.subject: HPWE
2054.descrlong: Designed to provide a reference source for the design, construction, renovation, and/or maintenance of sports grounds and facilities. In addition to design, construction, reconstruction, renovation, and maintenance and management procedures, the course will speak to the quality, evaluation, and safety of sport facilities including equipment, layout, and lighting and energy options. (Offered fall semester of odd years.)
